title: Changing Old Habits
description: Sarah talks about changing a bad habit and how it affected her daily life.
speaker: Sarah
text: For many years, I had a habit of staying up late and sleeping very little.
At first, I did not see this as a problem because I was able to finish my daily tasks.
Over time, however, I started to feel tired and less focused during the day.
My work performance dropped, and I often felt stressed for no clear reason.
After talking with a friend, I decided to change this habit.
I began going to bed earlier and created a simple evening routine to help me relax.
The first weeks were difficult, but slowly my energy improved.
Now, I feel healthier, more focused, and more productive at work.
This experience taught me how small changes can make a big difference.
